express_delivery.delivery_time: Obrada u roku od 1–2 sata i slanje već isti ili najkasnije sljedeći radni dan. Isporuka ovisi o dostavnoj službi – ne jamčimo točan dan isporuke.

PARCEL_LOCKERS.pricing: HP ili GLS paketomat: Ispod 50 €: 3,99 €. Iznad 50 €: Besplatno*. BOX NOW paketomat: Ispod 50 €: 2,99 €. Iznad 50 €: Besplatno*.

IN_STORE_PICKUP.pricing: Uvijek besplatno, neovisno o iznosu narudžbe

SUMMARY: DELIVERY OPTIONS: Polleo Sport provides standard home delivery, cargo delivery for bulky items (>30kg), parcel locker delivery, and free in-store pickup. PROVIDERS: Delivery partners include Overseas, HP (Hrvatska pošta), GLS, and BOX NOW. PRICING: Standard delivery is 3,99 € (Overseas/HP) or 4,99 € (GLS), with free shipping on orders over 50 € via Overseas/HP. Parcel locker delivery costs 2,99 € (BOX NOW) or 3,99 € (HP/GLS), and is also free for orders over 50 €. Cargo delivery is a flat 10,00 €. In-store pickup is always free. NOTABLE FEATURES: A 'Priority Order' option is available for an extra 2,99 € to expedite processing. Free shipping over 50 € is an alternative to receiving a gift. Delivery to islands takes longer (up to 7 days). Bulky items cannot be delivered to stores for pickup. WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is presented clearly on a dedicated page, detailing various options, providers, and costs. It is well-organized and easy to understand. However, it lacks information on standard delivery times for mainland Croatia and any potential cash-on-delivery surcharges.
